section.title: Blocks
section.para: Partials blocks are reusable view components that use its own scope to provide "blocks". Let's take an example of a blog comment, the blog comment has a title, a content, date, author and etc. Of course, Majisti does not provide blog comments as view partials, but you get the point.

section.title: The language switcher
section.para: The language switcher block will list the available locales (omitting the current locale) as links. Links uses the default request param as suggested in the I18n controller plugin to make your application switch to that selected locale.
